# Development and Implementation of a Successful Online Mathematics Course - CeLiID AGH

URL: https://www.cel.agh.edu.pl/webinar/development-and-implementation-of-a-successful-online-mathematics-course/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 22:37:30

CeLiID AGH

Twórz zasoby

Moodle / UPeL

Development and Implementation of a Successful Online Mathematics Course

Prowadzą:
Ana Paula Lopes, Filomena Soares (Polytechnic Institute of Porto)

11.03.2022 

During the webinar, we talked about the EngiMath Project – Mathematics on-line learning model in Engineering education, addressing the following issues:

Theoretical lessons development, structure and software,

Practical sections (question bank development),

Assessment sections,

Student Competition.

__________
